name: Decker Dungeons
description:
You, the most valorous and renowned knight in the kingdom has been sent to obliterate the lingering monsters that are inhabiting a forgotten dungeon near the outskirts of kingdom forest.

Are up to the task to manage your resources correctly and defeat the enemies standing in your way?

Game Production

  • The game was programmed entirely using Unity.
  • The art & animations were made using Adobe Photoshop and After effects.
  • The music was composed in Musescore and edited in REAPER.

Controls

  • Mouse
